name: Oshi's Journey
description:
Oshi's Journey is a Badland-inspired game where you have to guide your little sleeping Oshis to the end of the level.

You will need to work with your friends, bring them along for the journey! But sometimes, sacrifice is needed!

Enjoy a fun, addictive physics based journey! 

This game is my entry for the Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1

Controls:

Desktop - "Z" or "X" keys  to jump left/right. "R" key to restart the level.

Mobile - Touch bottom right or left side of screen to jump.

Made in GDevelop.

Music by Eric Matyas
www.soundimage.org
